name: Baked Sweet Potato Coins
author: Carol Castellucci Miller
summary: Use a spiralizer to bake homemade, healthy sweet potato chips the entire family will love.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon seasoned salt, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease 2 baking sheets with cooking spray
Make a lengthwise cut partway through the middle of each sweet potato
Cut potatoes into coins using the slicer attachment on a spiralizer
Arrange coins on the baking sheets
Season both sides with seasoned salt
Bake in the preheated oven until edges start to curl, 20 to 25 minutes
Let cool until crisp, about 10 minutes
